scripts.test: mocha test/index.js && istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly --check-leaks test/
scripts.build:umd: npm run build:lib && webpack index.js dist/countdown.js --config webpack.config.development.js
scripts.build:umd:min: npm run build:lib && webpack index.js dist/countdown.min.js --config webpack.config.production.js
